ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:18:52 [Issue ID 4000-115886] urn:comicvine:4000-115886 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 09:07:26. [Issue ID 239852]
ComicInfo.Summary: "Reveal the secrets that you keep inside..." Go behind the veil... and Into The Void. A pair of twin sisters who share a frightful secret venture into the Circus of Souls, unaware that they will soon be confronted with their violent past. They soon learn that nothing remains hidden for long from the Elder spirits that haunt the Psycho Circus. There are some secrets too terrible to say out loud, but sometimes it's the things you don't say that just might kill you!
ComicInfo.Title: Mirror Image Part 1
